name: Les Guignols de l'info: Le jeu!
overview: Les Guignols De L'Info...Le Jeu ! is a Point & Click game based on a French Satiric TV Program. You are a new TV reporter freshly engage in the WCI, an information Channel, and you must provide great scoop from different famous people coming from Sports, Politics, Movies, etc...Your Aim is to make a maximum of hearing to take the place of the main presenter: PPDA. There's no inventory. You only have a Video camera and a limited battery. You have to record Pictures and/or sounds in the theme of your mission briefing but there a lot of thing to check from a lot's of character. The choice is not easy and you have a limited time to do that. There's sometimes some puzzle part like "portrait robot" to do or right dialog to choose.
